backend/main.mo: Defines types and in-memory maps for categories, products, garden centers, orders, plant lists, and authorization helpers with search and lookup utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required asset updates, logo changes, favicon generation, and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files covering layout, pages, components, and theme configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers defining theme variables for light and dark modes with extensive OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading main script and referencing cache‑busted favicon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up app-wide theming, cart provider, routing tree, and all route mappings using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access denied message with optional principal ID panel and link back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Panel displaying a principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Restricts access to admin-only pages, showing loaders or an access denied screen based on role state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Blocks access for unauthenticated users and shows a login prompt card.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Allows access only to authenticated users with a customer role, otherwise shows loading or denial.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Checks for garden center membership or admin rights before rendering children, with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Ensures only platform admins can access the wrapped content and shows an access denied screen otherwise.
Wraps the application layout with header, footer, and main outlet content.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders social media and contact buttons for WhatsApp, Instagram, and email.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the main site header with navigation, role-based portal links, and cart/login elements.
Shows a badge with the number of items in the cart when greater than zero.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product’s image, name, description, price, and stock status with fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, initializing seed data, and a placeholder for toggling product active state, with query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches active products and filters them by garden center ID due to missing backend support for center-specific queries.
Manages garden center data and team member mutations, with several unimplemented backend methods returning placeholders or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Provides mutations to grant or revoke platform admin access using principals, with query invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role with fallback handling and exposes a helper for checking admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Loads the caller’s user profile from the backend with basic state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Queries whether the caller is an admin using the backend’s isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Saves the caller’s user profile and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a garden center through the backend and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Retrieves and filters active products by garden center, and provides mutations for adding products plus placeholders for unimplemented updates and toggles.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Returns placeholder garden center data based on caller role due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates a garden center’s name and location, then invalidates relevant queries.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Returns an empty list of user orders pending backend implementation.
Attempts to create an order but always errors because backend order placement is unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches all product categories from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Loads full category taxonomy including subcategories.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches a single product by ID from the backend.
Provides React Query hooks to fetch active products, products by category, and perform client‑side product search.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context including login, logout, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming with light and dark palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing query and identity contexts before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin interface for managing garden centers, their members, and nursery removal or status changes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Admin page for adding or removing platform admins via Principal IDs with validation and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for listing, adding, and toggling activation of products, using category and product hooks with a form for new product creation.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents with quantity controls, item removal, and a summary section, or an empty‑cart state.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Implements product browsing with search, category filters, taxonomy handling, and dynamic product display.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows an order summary and handles authenticated order placement, redirecting if the cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, feature highlights, and category listings using taxonomy data.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays authenticated users’ order history with status badges, product details, and totals.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Nursery dashboard allowing garden center editing and product management, including adding products with images and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details and links to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Customer portal that redirects authenticated customers to the catalog and blocks non-customers.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Nursery portal that redirects existing members to the dashboard or allows new nursery registration.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Team portal validating platform admin access, showing loading/error states and redirecting admins to the nursery admin page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view with images, description, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart state with persistence, item updates, totals, and storage syncing.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for loading, saving, and clearing the cart with versioned serialization.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Type definitions for cart items, state, actions, and the cart context.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Hook providing access to the cart context with an error if used outside the provider.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utility functions for flattening category hierarchies, retrieving descendants and leaf categories, and finding category nodes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins, defining the design tokens used across the frontend.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the GreenPlantz platform.
